project_description: A simple Flutter application using the Cubit pattern for state management. The app consists of a login screen and a home screen with a logout button.
architecture_overview: The project follows a modular architecture with separation of concerns between UI, state management, and data models. The Cubit pattern is used for state management, and the application is divided into widgets, cubits, models, and screens.

lib.main.dart: Entry point of the Flutter application.

screens.login_screen.dart: Login screen with email and password fields.
screens.home_screen.dart: Home screen with a logout button.

files.name: lib/main.dart
files.description: Entry point of the Flutter application. Provides the necessary cubits using BlocProvider.

methods.name: main
methods.description: Main entry point of the application.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Builds the main widget of the application.

files.name: lib/screens/login_screen.dart
files.description: Login screen with email and password fields.

files.name: lib/screens/home_screen.dart
files.description: Home screen with a logout button.

widgets.name: LoginScreen
widgets.description: Login screen with email and password fields.

widgets.name: HomeScreen
widgets.description: Home screen with a logout button.

dependencies.name: flutter
dependencies.purpose: Flutter SDK for building the app.

sequence_diagram:
@startuml
actor User
User -> LoginScreen: Open
LoginScreen -> AuthCubit: Login
AuthCubit -> HomeScreen: Navigate
HomeScreen -> AuthCubit: Logout
AuthCubit -> LoginScreen: Navigate
@enduml
state_management_flow: State is managed using the Cubit pattern. AuthCubit handles the authentication state and provides methods for login and logout. The state flows from the cubit to the widgets through BlocBuilder.
navigation_flow: The app starts with the LoginScreen. Upon successful login, the user is navigated to the HomeScreen. Clicking the logout button navigates the user back to the LoginScreen.

pubspec_yaml.name: flutter_cubit_app
pubspec_yaml.description: A simple Flutter application using the Cubit pattern for state management.
